page.title: 07ST. BARTHOLOMEWS SCHOOL.
page.content: St Bartholomews, a{mixed comprehensive school with about 1500 pupils, has about 100 members of staff. As well as about 600 sixth formers there are 7 forms in each age range. The school was{founded in 1465}and was closely linked with the hospital from which it gets its name. It was originally a single-sex grammar school. {School uniform}is compulsory and is a green and purple tie, white or grey shirt with black blazer, black skirt for girls and black trousers for boys. The school is undergoing extensive {changes}with 6 new classrooms, a drama studio,sports hall, music room,2 labs and a 6th. form centre being built at a cost of Â£1.3 million. 1985 also marks the{retirement of Mr {B.Cooper}after 25 years as headmaster.
